Module mesakit.map.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.mesakit.map.ui.desktop.graphics.canvas.projections

Class CartesianMapProjection

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.mesakit.map.ui.desktop.graphics.canvas.projections.CartesianMapProjection
All Implemented Interfaces:
MapProjection
public class CartesianMapProjection extends Object implements MapProjection
Does a simple linear mapping between a (Cartesian) CoordinateSystem and a Rectangle of the world in degrees of latitude and longitude. This projection is fast, but it is inaccurate at longer distances, especially at high latitudes.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
